## Load the libraries
```{r}
library(nycflights13)
library(tidyverse)
```

## nycflights13
All flights.
```{r}
flights
```

## Filter
Flights between JFK and SFO airports.
```{r echo=TRUE}
flights %>% 
  filter(origin=="JFK" & dest=="SFO")
```

##Plot
Count of flights between JFK and SFO airports by carrier.
```{r}
flights %>% 
  filter(origin=="JFK" & dest=="SFO") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=carrier))+
  geom_bar()
```
